page.title: 15Famous People.
page.content: Three of the most prominant people in this area are Robert Bailey,Julie Eggerton and Ian Mycott. Robert Bailey, an ex-Knypersley cricket player,now plays for Northamptonshire.He was nick- named the "Biddulph Basher" being an ex-pupil of Biddulph High School and he was tipped to play for the senior England side. Ian Mycott, also an ex-pupil of the High School,was English Schools Cycling Association under 16 and 18 National 10 mile Champion. He also cycled for the GB under 18 juniors,and has ridden in Lanciano,Italy and Brunswick, West Germany. Julie Eggerton,a present pupil at the High School,has participated in the 1985 Junior Pentathlon (Germany v Eng- land) and 2nd runner up to the German National champion.
